quote: Honesty is the first chapter of the book wisdom.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Love and honesty don’t mix.
author: Miguel Syjuco,  Ilustrado

quote: When you walk a life of honesty, you live a life of truth.
author: Therese Benedict

quote: Honesty is the most single most important factor having a direct bearing on the final success of an individual, corporation, or product.
author: Ed McMahon

quote: The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: You're only responsible for being honest, not for someone else's reaction to your honesty.
author: Kelli Jae Baeli,  ISO

quote: Truth builds trust.
author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: Honest is how I want to look. The truth doesn't glitter and shine.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Survivor

quote: A dishonest man you can always trust to be dishonest.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Honesty may be the best policy, but it's important to remember that apparently, by elimination, dishonesty is the second-best policy.
author: George Carlin

quote: We learned about honesty and integrity - that the truth matters... that you don't take shortcuts or play by your own set of rules... and success doesn't count unless you earn it fair and square.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: I just think if you don't say the honest thing, sometimes the honest thing never becomes true, you know, and I-
author: John Green,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: Knowing the truth is not always a kindness.
author: Rosamund Hodge,  Cruel Beauty

quote: How would your life be different if…You approached all relationships with authenticity and honesty? Let today be the day…You dedicate yourself to building relationships on the solid foundation of truth and authenticity.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Honesty and loyalty are key. If two people can be honest with each other about everything, that's probably the biggest key to success.
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: Truth is beauty
author: Lisi Harrison

quote: Honest, open communication is the only street that leads us into the real world... We then begin to grow as never before. And once we are on this road, happiness cannot be far away.
author: John Powell,  Will the Real Me Please Stand Up?: 25 Guidelines for Good Communication

quote: Self-respect. It would make me lovable. And it's the secret to good sex.
author: Susan Sontag,  As Consciousness is Harnessed to Flesh: Journals and Notebooks, 1964-1980

quote: I is for Integrity, be honest with yourself and others.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal,  The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: One of the few things in life that cannot possibly do harm in the end is the honest pursuit of the truth.
author: Peter Kreeft,  Pocket Handbook of Christian Apologetics

quote: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: The real things haven't changed. It is still best to be honest and truthful; to make the most of what we have; to be happy with simple pleasures; and have courage when things go wrong.
author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: Trust your gut feelings.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Wisdom mitigates the risk of being honest.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A truth that's told with bad intentBeats all the lies you can invent.
author: William Blake,  Auguries of Innocence

quote: The mind knows the truth when your heart denies what it feels. When you don't feel safe to let people in, it is because you're not ready to deal with the pain of honesty.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: It must require bravery to be honest all the time.
author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quote: Your personal truth is your gift to the world.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: Transparency, honesty, kindness, good stewardship, even humor, work in businesses at all times.
author: John Gerzema

quote: Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you.
author: Stephanie Klein,  Straight Up and Dirty

quote: Confidence in others' honesty is no light testimony of one's own integrity.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: I always tell the truth. Even when I lie.
author: Al Pacino

quote: Whatever games are played with us, we must play no games with ourselves, but deal in our privacy with the last honesty and truth.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson,  The Essential Writings of Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Wisdom. . .is knowing what you have to accept.
author: Wallace Stegner,  Angle of Repose

quote: If you like someone, you tell the truth because that, to me, is respect. If you hate someone, you tell them the truth because what do you have to lose?
author: Tara Kelly,  Harmonic Feedback

quote: But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie.
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: Deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare,  All's Well That Ends Well

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The more one does and sees and feels, the more one is able to do, and the more genuine may be one's appreciation of fundamental things like home, and love, and understanding companionship.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Initially, the truth may hurt, but lies hurt always.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: How can sincerity be a condition of friendship? A taste for truth at any cost is a passion which spares nothing.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The truth is the kindest thing we can give folks in the end.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: The only faithfulness people have is to emotions they're trying to recapture
author: Norman Mailer

quote: But I'm going to try to tell the truth. Except for the parts I'm leav­ing out, because there's still stuff I'm just not going to tell you. Get used to it.
author: Robin McKinley,  Dragonhaven

quote: Something, somewhere, knows what’s best for me and promises to keep sending me people and experiences to light my way as long as I live in gratitude and keep paying attention to the signs.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: You can only trust your emotions as you can lie to yourself with your brain but not your heart.
author: Carl White

quote: OK, in all seriousness, I would say I couldn't be in a relationship without equality, generosity, integrity, spirit, kindness and humor. And awesomeness.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: What's most important in a friendship? Tolerance and loyalty.
author: J.K. Rowling
